title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 45 - Emergency Lighting Equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 45 - Emergency Lighting Equipment

State Regulations
§ 45.1 - Emergency lighting equipment required
§ 45.2 - Name and marking of red emergency reflector
§ 45.3 - Construction
§ 45.4 - Procedure for securing approval
§ 45.5 - Changes in approval requirements

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 45

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 214, 215, 375[17]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
